name: Proficiency in Animation development at level 6
description: Proficiency in the architecture, design and development of animated and interactive systems such as games and simulations.

issuer.name: Institute of Coding
issuer.description: Our mission is to break down barriers to digital learning and employment. We believe learning should be a lifelong process and that everyone has a right to improve their skills. We want to spread opportunity by offering access to education, providing what you need, when you need it, in a place you can reach.

criteria.narrative:
The holder has applied relevant knowledge to demonstrate in a realistic (*) environment that they can perform most of the activities defined in the following SFIA description:  Provides overall creative direction in the conception and design of animation products such as games and simulations.

* Whilst proficiency must be demonstrated in a working context, a workplace supervisor may make a case to justify the use of a professional simulated environment for specific safety-critical tasks.

alignment.targetDescription: The architecture, design and development of animated and interactive systems such as games and simulations.
